title: Senior Python Backend Developer
description:
Forte Group is looking for a Senior Python Developer to join our dynamic team that builds reliable and performant backend components. AboutWe’re developing a digital platform that helps users buy, sell and manage their investment portfolios. The platform provides the world's first semantic search engine for finance that helps discover, compare, and buy investment products such as ETFs, mutual funds, and stocks. We’re changing the way users shop for investments. We are a marketplace that lets users do more than just trade stocks. With us, users can search, discover, and invest in the ideas and values that are the most important to them with the help of our conversational AI capability.Tool and Tech Stack:● Language(s) and platforms - Python 3, Pandas, GraphQL● Tooling - AWS (Elasticsearch, CloudWatch), DataDog● Infrastructure - AWS (DynamoDB, EKS, S3 Bucket)● Integrations/services - Plaid Investment APIResponsibilities:● Developing and maintaining existing application, in particular developing backend integration solutions;● Working with Product team while applying strong analytical and problem-solving skills to deliver high-quality software that meets the needs of our clients and stakeholders;● Conducting code reviews and mentoring less experienced colleagues;● Participate in requirements gathering and solution designQualifications:● Self-driven team member in a high-performing development team who cares about the team culture and takes pride in the outcome of the teamwork● Bright and engaging with "start-up" energy and passion● Flexible and able to align with priorities coming from the business● Enjoys an Agile development environment, Scrum methodology experience will be a plus● Excellent interpersonal and communication skills● Upper-Intermediate English or higherExperience:● BS/BSE degree or equivalent with a minimum of 4 years of relevant work experience in software engineering● Experience in building/integrating Backend APIs● Experience with automated code testing● Experience working on enterprise level, production applicationsWe offer:● Experience working with colleagues locally and abroad● Opportunities for self-realization working on challenging projects using new technologies and tools● Friendly team and enjoyable working environment● Social and corporate events● Possibility for career development● Participation in professional trainings, meetups● Medical & family care programs● Various sport activities coverage● Fully paid by Forte 5 sick days during working year● Internal English courses provided by Forte Teacher● Comfortable and fully equipped workplace

title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer Python/Data Engineer
description:
Our Swiss client is an independent, partner-owned investment firm founded in 2013, with a growing team of currently 70 people and offices in Switzerland (Pfäffikon SZ & Küsnacht ZH), the United States (New York), Ireland (Dublin), Liechtenstein (Vaduz), and Hong Kong. We are dedicated to a long-term, global investment strategy focused on public equity markets.Our highly disciplined investment process combines fundamental research expertise and advanced data science. We aim to identify high-quality mid cap stocks with 2X return potential over a time horizon of 5–7 years, equivalent to a 10–15% return per annum. What sets us apart from others is our collective decision making, the level of insight and transparency we offer to our investors, and the use of technology to enhance all aspects of our business.About team:The technology department comprises 20 members – 6 Quant Researcher, 5 Data Engineers and 10 Fullstack Developers. We believe in collaboration and collective team intelligence while encouraging individual contributions.Requirements:Responsibilities:- Develop, test, and maintain our web application using Python and React.- Design and implement user interfaces using React.- Develop and maintain Python backend services.- Monitor the application and ensure problems are addressed and fixed.- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in web development and bring new ideas and solutions to the organization.- Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including quant researcher, software developers and business stakeholders, to understand their data needs and ensure they are met.Implement and monitor data pipelines to move data from various sources to a central data warehouse.- Monitor the data quality, performance and storage needs to ensure data is up to date and accessible. Optimize the data modell for new scalability requirements.- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in data engineering and bring new ideas and solutions to the organization.- Provide technical guidance and mentorship to juniors.Requirements:- This role requires a candidate who is passionate about data and finance, works well in a collaborative team-based environment, and is proactive and intrinsically motivated to go the extra mile.- A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.- Expert Knowledge in Python with experience in organizing large code bases. We rely on flask, sqlalchemy, celery heavily (5+years)- Proficient in data modelling and structuring relational databases. - Proficient in SQL.- Experience with modern data tools is a plus (like pandas, dask, pyspark).- Experience with Infrastructure / DevOps is a plus (Docker, Cloud, Azure).- Experience with data visualization is a plus (like D3.js).- A good understanding of Finance is a plus (for example Financials, balance sheets, accounting data, FX).

title: Team Lead Python Developer for VastData
description:
We are looking for a Team Lead Python Developer for our client VastData- a technology company that focuses on data storage, specifically flash memory. Founded in 2016, VAST Data has a headquarter based in the US and R&D in Israel.Responsibilities- Design, build and set up development tools and infrastructure for use by the various teams in the R&D organization- Test infrastructure used by the QA (the product is a cluster composed of different components and infrastructure encapsulates them, tracking their state, exposing different APIs to communicate with them, etc.)- Maintain and develop API and interfaces facing the company storage product + different cloud providers- Collaborate with other teams to improve the productivity of the entire R&D organization- Deal with diverse technologies and domains: Docker, Git, Python, Linux, and VM orchestrationRequirements- 7+ years of Python development experience- 2+ years of experience working on Linux platform, proficient in Linux environment- 3+ years of experience with team management, at least 3 engineers- Proven experience in server-side Python programming, featuring: multi-threading, multi-processing, communication protocols, and databases- OOP, SOLID- Fluent or Upper-Intermediate EnglishWhat's in it for you- Care: your mental and physical health is our priority. We ensure comprehensive company-paid medical insurance, Mental Health programs, as well as financial and legal consultations- Tailored education path: boost your skills and knowledge with our regular internal events (meetups, conferences, workshops), Udemy licence, language courses and company-paid certifications- Growth environment: share your experience and level up your expertise with a community of skilled professionals, locally and globally- Flexibility: choose how you want to work – a 100% remote or on-sight in our offices. Own your schedule – you are the one to decide when to start your working day.- Opportunities: we value our specialists and always find the best options for them. Our Internal Mobility Program helps change a project if needed to help you grow, excel professionally and fulfil your potential- Global impact: work on large-scale projects that redefine industries with international and fast-growing clients- Welcoming environment: feel empowered with a friendly team, open-door policy, informal atmosphere within the company and regular team-building events

title: Junior software engineer (parsing/reverse)
description:
Big data, AI та військова сфера - це те, що ми поєднали у своїй роботі. Працюємо "at the cutting edge of innovation", аналізуємо великі дані із соцмереж, ідентифікуємо людей за фото, вирішуємо інші корисні задачі для військових та бізнесу.Чому вакансія повинна тебе зацікавити?- Можливість поєднати створення високотехнологічних продуктів та роботу в інтересах ЗСУ- Розробляємо технології AI з аналізу людей, унікальні у світовому масштабі. Майже як у Чорному дзеркалі. У нас цікаво, незвично та багато драйву- На кожній позиції ми надаємо свободу дій, "творчості", а також даємо складні задачі та допомагаємо їх вирішувати, що дозволяє дуже швидко прокачувати свої навики та бачити результати саме своєї роботиТехнічні вимоги:- Досвід роботи з Python (asyncio, multiprocessing, aiohttp, requests, BeautifulSoup, Selenium)- Досвід парсингу open data- Розуміння асимптотики, алгоритмів, структур даних, основ паралельного програмування- Розуміння основних принципів передачі даних у мережі- Досвід роботи з NoSQL та SQL базами даних (MongoDB, Redis)Бажано:- Знайомство з Java (Android), JavaScript (frida), adb- Бекграунд у сфері application security- Досвід роботи з Linux, Docker- Досвід створення API, оптимізації програмного кодуПриклади задач:- Application security analysis- Розробка інструментів збору інформації із відкритих джерел- Використання інструментів роботи з big data — побудова кластерних рішень- Побудова пайплайнів передачі даних
